about.description:
deon is a command line tool that allows you to easily add an ethics
checklist to your data science projects. The conversation about ethics in
data science, machine learning, and AI is increasingly important. The goal
of deon is to push that conversation forward and provide concrete,
actionable reminders to the developers that have influence over how data
science gets done.
about.summary: A command line tool to easily add an ethics checklist to your data science projects.

name: deon

about.description:
deon is a command line tool that allows you to easily add an ethics
checklist to your data science projects. The conversation about ethics in
data science, machine learning, and AI is increasingly important. The goal
of deon is to push that conversation forward and provide concrete,

about.summary: A command line tool to easily add an ethics checklist to your data science projects.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "deon" %}
{% set version = "0.2.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cc2e9e58f8c8d740dc393dda4dfdbbab1e716ae151f81a0e09a80cbca1e7117d

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  build:
  host:
    - python >=3.6
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.6
    - beautifulsoup4 >=4.6.1
    - click >=6.7
    - pyyaml >=3.13

test:
  imports:
    - deon
  commands:
    - deon --help

about:
  home: http://deon.drivendata.org/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: A command line tool to easily add an ethics checklist to your data science projects.
  description: |
    deon is a command line tool that allows you to easily add an ethics
    checklist to your data science projects. The conversation about ethics in
    data science, machine learning, and AI is increasingly important. The goal
    of deon is to push that conversation forward and provide concrete,
    actionable reminders to the developers that have influence over how data
    science gets done.
  doc_url: http://deon.drivendata.org/
  dev_url: https://github.com/drivendataorg/deon

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ejm714
    - jayqi
    - pjbull
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.3
